subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The Indy Racing League’s IndyCar Series will race in Long Beach, Calif., and in Toronto for the first time next season. The Grand Prix of Long Beach will be run on April 19. It has hosted F1, CART and Champ Car races. Champ Car ran its final event there this season. The I.R.L. will then hold the Streets of Toronto race on July 12.
